list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a religion practiced in parts of the Caribbean and the southern US, combining elements of Roman Catholic ritual with traditional African magical and religious rites, and characterized by sorcery and spirit possession.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they can use voodoo to help people
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ có thể sử dụng Voodoo để giúp mọi người

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: affect (someone) by the practice of voodoo.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ai đó đã voodooed cô ấy
